flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Saca las orejas por encima de la hierba para explorarnel territorio. Le protege su cuerno venenoso.
Stiffens its earsnto sense danger.nThe larger itsfhorns, the morenpowerful itsnsecreted venom.
Stiffens its earsnto sense danger.nThe larger itsfhorns, the morenpowerful itsnsecreted venom.
Its large earsnare always keptnupright. If itfsenses danger, itnwill attack with anpoisonous sting.
It is small, butnits horn is fillednwith poison. Itfcharges then stabsnwith the horn toninject poison.
It raises its bignears to check itsnsurroundings.fIt will strikenfirst if it sensesnany danger.
It constantlynmoves its largenears in manyfdirections innorder to detectndanger right away.
The male NIDORAN has developednmuscles for moving its ears. Thanks tonthem, the ears can be freely moved infany direction. Even the slightest soundndoes not escape this POKéMON’s notice.
The male NIDORAN has developednmuscles for moving its ears. Thanks tonthem, the ears can be freely moved infany direction. Even the slightest soundndoes not escape this POKéMON’s notice.
The male NIDORAN has developed musclesnthat freely move its ears in any direction.nEven the slightest sound does not escapenthis POKéMON’s notice.
Its large ears are flapped like wingsnwhen it is listening to distant sounds.nIt extends toxic barbs when angered.
It stiffens its ears to sense danger.nThe larger its horns, the more npowerful its secreted venom.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
It is small, but its horn is fillednwith poison. It charges then stabsnwith the horn to inject poison.
It raises its big ears to check itsnsurroundings. It will strikenfirst if it senses any danger.
Il jauge le terrain en laissantnses oreilles dépasser de l’herbe.nIl se défend avec sa corne toxique.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
Il jauge le terrain en laissantnses oreilles dépasser de l’herbe.nIl se défend avec sa corne toxique.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
It scans its surroundings bynraising its ears out of the grass.nIts toxic horn is for protection.
くさむらの　うえに　みみだけ　だしてnまわりの　けはいを　さぐる。nもうどくの　ツノで　みを　まもる。
풀밭 위로 귀만 내어n주위의 낌새를 살핀다.n맹독의 뿔로 몸을 보호한다.
Il jauge le terrain en laissant ses oreilles dépassernde l’herbe. Il se défend avec sa corne toxique.
Es untersucht die Umgebung, indem es die Ohrennspitzt und lauscht. Sein giftiges Horn schützt es.
Esamina l’ambiente circostante tendendo le orecchienfuori dall’erba. Si protegge con il corno velenoso.
It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out ofnthe grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
草むらの　上に　耳だけ　出してnまわりの　気配を　探る。n猛毒の　ツノで　身を　守る。
みみが　おおきく　とおくの　おとをnきくとき　はばたくように　うごく。nおこると　どくばりを　だす。
귀가 커서 먼 곳의 소리를n들을 때 날개 치듯 움직인다.n화나면 독침을 쏜다.
Ce Pokémon agite ses oreilles comme pour entendrentout ce qui se passe au loin. Il déploie des aiguillonsntoxiques quand il est en colère.
Seine großen Ohren schlagen wie Flügel, wenn esnGeräusche in weiter Entfernung hört. Es fährtngiftige Stacheln aus, wenn es verärgert ist.
Cambia la orientación de las grandes orejas quentiene para oír mejor. Si se enfada, despliega susnpúas venenosas.
Solleva le orecchie come ali per captare rumori innlontananza. Quando è adirato, estende i baffi velenosi.
Its large ears are flapped like wings when it isnlistening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbsnwhen angered.
耳が　大きく　遠くの　音をn聞くとき　はばたくように　動く。n怒ると　毒針を　出す。
みみを　うごかす　きんにくが　はったつしていてnどんな　むきにも　じざいに　みみを　うごかせる。nかすかな　ものおとも　ききもらさない　ポケモン。
귀를 움직이는 근육이 발달되어 있어서n어떤 방향으로든 자유로이 귀를 움직일 수 있다.n희미한 소리도 빠트리지 않고 듣는 포켓몬이다.
Nidoran♂ a développé des muscles pour bougernses oreilles. Ainsi, il peut les orienter à sa guise.nCe Pokémon peut entendre le plus discret des bruits.
Nidoran♂ hat Muskeln entwickelt, um seine Ohren bewegennzu können. Dadurch kann es sie in jede beliebige Richtungndrehen. Diesem Pokémon entgeht nicht einmal das leisestenGeräusch.
Nidoran♂ ha desarrollado músculos para mover las orejas ynorientarlas en cualquier dirección. De este modo, es capaz dencaptar hasta el sonido más leve.
Nidoran♂ ha sviluppato dei muscoli per muovere liberamentenle orecchie in qualsiasi direzione. Così, questo Pokémonnè in grado di percepire anche il più flebile fruscio.
Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanksnto them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Evennthe slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon’s notice.
耳を　動かす　筋肉が　発達していてnどんな　向きにも　自在に　耳を　動かせる。nかすかな　物音も　聞き漏らさない　ポケモン。
みみを　うごかす　きんにくが　はったつしていてnどんな　むきにも　じざいに　みみを　うごかせる。nかすかな　ものおとも　ききもらさない　ポケモン。
귀를 움직이는 근육이 발달되어 있어서n어떤 방향으로든 자유로이 귀를 움직일 수 있다.n희미한 소리도 빠트리지 않고 듣는 포켓몬이다.
Nidoran♂ a développé des muscles pour bougernses oreilles. Ainsi, il peut les orienter à sa guise.nCe Pokémon peut entendre le plus discret des bruits.
Nidoran♂ hat Muskeln entwickelt, um seine Ohrennbewegen zu können. Dadurch kann es sie in jedenbeliebige Richtung wenden. Diesem Pokémon entgehtnnicht das leiseste Geräusch.
Nidoran♂ ha desarrollado músculos para mover las orejas ynorientarlas en cualquier dirección. De este modo, es capaz dencaptar hasta el sonido más leve.
Nidoran♂ ha sviluppato dei muscoli per muovere liberamentenle orecchie in qualsiasi direzione. Così, questo Pokémonnè in grado di percepire anche il più flebile fruscio.
Nidoran♂ has developed muscles for moving its ears. Thanksnto them, the ears can be freely moved in any direction. Evennthe slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon’s notice.
耳を　動かす　筋肉が　発達していてnどんな　向きにも　自在に　耳を　動かせる。nかすかな　物音も　聞き漏らさない　ポケモン。
いつも　おおきな　みみを　たててnまわりの　けはいを　さぐる。きけんをnかんじたときは　どくバリを　つかう。
언제나 커다란 귀를 세워서n주위의 낌새를 살핀다.n위험을 감지하면 독침을 사용한다.
總是豎起大大的耳朵，n探查著周遭的狀況。n察覺到危險時會用毒針來應付。
Ses grandes oreilles sont toujours dressées etnà l’affût de ce qu’il se passe alentour. S’il estnmenacé, il se défend avec ses dards venimeux.
Es stellt seine großen Ohren auf, um so seinenUmgebung zu überwachen. Droht Gefahr,nso greift es mit seinen Giftstacheln an.
Mantiene sus grandes orejas levantadas, siemprenalerta. Si advierte peligro, ataca con las púasnvenenosas.
Rizza le orecchie enormi per sondare i dintorni.nSe percepisce un pericolo, attacca con gli aculeinvelenosi.
Its large ears are always kept upright. If it sensesndanger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.
いつも　大きな　耳を　立ててnまわりの　気配を　探る。危険をn感じたときは　どくバリを　使う。
一直竖起它的大耳朵n感知周围的情形。当它n察觉到危险便会使用毒针。
いつも　おおきな　みみを　たててnまわりの　けはいを　さぐる。きけんをnかんじたときは　どくバリを　つかう。

Mantiene sus grandes orejas levantadas, siemprenalerta. Si advierte peligro, ataca con las púasnvenenosas.
Rizza le orecchie enormi per sondare i dintorni.nSe percepisce un pericolo, attacca con gli aculeinvelenosi.
